Navigation
Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Number/max
Synopsis Determine the largest of two numeric values.
Function &T <: num max(&T <: num n, &T <: num m)
Description The largest of two numbers. The type of the result is the same as the type of the largest argument.
Examples 
rascal>import Number;
ok
rascal>max(12, 13);
int: 13
rascal>max(12, 13.5);
num: 13.5
rascal>max(12, 11.5);
num: 12
Questions
Question 1.
The type of max(2, -16) is

Question 2.
The type of max(-17, 5.0092272456596400) is

Question 3. 
max(6, -19.7300989140498872400) ==

Question 4. 
max(8.87423962598938800, ) == 20.87423962598938800

Question 5. 
max(0.76660664363518800, ) == 0.76660664363518800
